story_by_level.0: The system has recovered enough to know this: a surprise exists. It is refusing to elaborate.
story_by_level.1: The system has recovered enough to know this: initial data loss was caused by excessive secrecy and holiday excitement.
story_by_level.2: The system has recovered enough to know this: additional information became available after promising not to spoil anything.
story_by_level.3: The system has recovered enough to know this: progress accelerated once curiosity reached critical levels.
story_by_level.4: The system has recovered enough to know this: further recovery was unlocked after confirming this was, in fact, an amazing adventure.
story_by_level.5: The system has recovered enough to know this: some details remain hidden on purpose. This is a feature, not a bug.
story_by_level.6: The system has recovered enough to know this: remaining information is now being released slowly for quality control.
story_by_level.7: The system has recovered enough to know this: most systems are operational, but one key reveal remains under embargo.
story_by_level.8: The system has recovered enough to know this: final clarity is imminent, pending departure conditions.
story_by_level.9: Recovery complete. This is no longer a secret â€” itâ€™s time to go.

subline_by_level.0: Dates are stable. The rest is being gently restored as the system allows.
subline_by_level.3: Some details have returned. Others remain intentionally protected.
subline_by_level.6: Most systems are functional. Surprise integrity remains high.
subline_by_level.9: Core itinerary recovered. Surprise integrity: happily compromised.
